name: interfamily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between families: Romeo and Juliet is a tale of inter-family strife a prolonged interfamily vendetta
between members of the same family: The sisters were engaged in an inter-family battle for the title. The state's marriage laws prevent polygamy, bigamy, and interfamily marriage.
More examplesFewer examplesMany business alliances were based on marriages or interfamily collaborations.The judge grew weary of all the interfamily bickering.We weren't supposed to tell anybody for fear of inter-family feuding and other consequences.
